item.title: A Study in Black
item.description: Someone has violated corporate policy by watching porn using the corp PC. Do you have the authority?

item.title: Case 1. IP Theft Linux Investigation
item.description: Nearly all IP (intellectual property) are recreated by a competitor. Investigate the development machine

item.title: Case 3. Yet Another Linux Investigation
item.description: Running netstat, see the weird python script with established connection to some remote host: Grab the executable: lsof -p 2082 and ps aux grep 2082.

item.title: Case 4. Compromised Apache Server
item.description: Compromised Apache Web server with drupal application used for local team. There was some unusual activity noticed between 05/10 and 08/10/19.

item.title: Case 5. Kali Linux Data Exfiltration
item.description: IP theft and Kali Linux is a suspect. Has the user exfiltrated pictures or documents?
